title: Staff API Routes
description:
Create REST API Endpoints for Staff Management and Profile Operations

Design and implement a complete set of RESTful API routes to handle staff-related operations and profile data retrieval.

Requirements:
- Define resource routes following REST conventions (GET, POST, PUT/PATCH, DELETE)
- Implement staff CRUD operations:
  - GET /api/staff - List all staff members with pagination support
  - GET /api/staff/:id - Retrieve individual staff profile
  - POST /api/staff - Create new staff member
  - PUT/PATCH /api/staff/:id - Update staff information
  - DELETE /api/staff/:id - Remove staff member
- Add profile query endpoints:
  - GET /api/staff/:id/profile - Fetch detailed profile information
  - GET /api/staff/search - Search staff by criteria (name, department, role, etc.)
- Implement proper HTTP status codes for all responses
- Add request validation for required fields and data types
- Include error handling with descriptive messages
- Add authentication/authorization middleware to protect sensitive operations
- Document API endpoints with request/response examples
- Consider filtering, sorting, and pagination for list endpoints
- Write integration tests for all routes

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Handle requests for non-existent staff IDs
- Validate uniqueness constraints (e.g., email, employee ID)
- Manage partial updates vs full replacements
- Handle malformed request payloads
